name: Saving Private Teddy
description:
Help our pint-sized protagonist conquer her fear of the dark and save her best friend Private Teddy using mirrors and prisms.

W A S D: Move

Left Click: Interact (Hint: Hold the Left Click to Hold the object)

(Levels 4 to 6 without art and polish)

Game Engine: Unity

Art Applications: Blender, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator 

All 3D models and 2D concepts are made by our team’s artists.

Rig and animations are exported from Mixamo.com

Sounds from freesounds.org

Dev Team: CostFathers

Thanks for playing our game.
